channel.title: AI Training on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AI Training on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Authors celebrate “historic” settlement coming soon in Anthropic class action
item.description: Advocates fear such settlements will “financially ruin” the AI industry.

item.title: College student’s “time travel” AI experiment accidentally outputs real 1834 history
item.description: Hobbyist training AI on Victorian texts gets an unexpected history lesson from his own creation.

item.title: Reddit blocks Internet Archive to end sneaky AI scraping
item.description: The Internet Archive confirmed it’s in ongoing discussions with Reddit after block.

item.title: Meta pirated and seeded porn for years to train AI, lawsuit says
item.description: Lawsuit: Meta may have seeded porn to minors while hiding piracy for AI training.
